textBox.richText: seSales 1.5.2 is a maintenance release focused on correcting some minor issues with the 1.5.1 release. Included in this release are the following items: Enhancements • Added “Employee Sales” report which shows the amount of sales produced per employee fora configurable period of time. • Added average vendor cost to the Sales By Category report. Corrections • Drawer summary will accurately reflect refunds. • Drawer will remain open even if the company data file is switched. • Random key strokes will not cause additional items to be added to invoices. • Corrected an error that allowed negative numbers to be entered during create of purchase orders. • Corrected an error with pagination in the Store Credit Report. • Corrected an error that was allowing archived items to be added to purchase orders. • Corrected an error that was preventing layaway payments from showing in drawer reports. • Adjusted the bottom margin on 80mm receipts when a note is included. • Corrected an issue with the resolution date of invoices getting set when an administrator changed the invoice date. • Corrected an issue where the drawer was not being updated when an invoice was posted. • Corrected a refresh issue with the drawer activity viewer. • Corrected a calculation error on special orders in the activity reports. This update is free to all registered users. MSZ
